identity.description:
Load an existing embedding database from a local or external source into ToolUniverse.

Load an existing embedding database from a local path or external source. Allows importing databases created elsewhere or backed up databases into the current ToolUniverse instance.

action.description: Action to load database from external source

database_path.description: Path to the existing database directory or file

database_name.description: Local name to assign to the loaded database

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing database with same name

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
